title: Nicolle Wallace | Howard Schultz and Cliff Sims Stumble in Interviews: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump facing an independent challenge from the former CEO of Starbucks and a tell-all book from a former aide.

Then, Nicolle Wallace speculates on how the Trump administration is preparing for the State of the Union, and she talks about Nancy Pelosi's legislative acumen and what Senator Kamala Harris has that scares Trump.

After that, Wallace takes a few more questions backstage at Studio 8G.
